description: Blood Brothers pt. 1. Story by Rob Liefeld, Marat Mychaels, and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Continued from the Brigade mini-series. The Brigade team returns from their mission in outer space only to be blind-sided by Battlestone's past. Bloodstrike, the government's elite group of metas, has been sent to bring the outlaw team down. In the first few moments of the fight, Stasis is killed, Cold Snap is crippled, and Seahawk and Kayo are taken down. Things aren't looking good for the home-team. Guest-starring Bloodstrike. Story continues in Bloodstrike #2.
name: Blood Brothers, Part 1: A Sort of Homecoming

description: Blood Brothers pt. 3. Story by Rob Liefeld, Marat Mychaels, and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Continued from Bloodstrike #2. It's Seahawk vs. Cabbot. Plus, Bloodstrike catches up with a depleted Brigade, but when things seem to be at their worst back-up arrives in the form of the new and improved Coldsnap. Guest-starring Bloodstrike. Story continues in Bloodstrike #3. Plus, the back-up story "Hard Copy" featuring secrets revealed about Thermal by Eric Stephenson, Marat Mychaels, Matt Haley, and Karl Story.
name: Blood Brothers, Part 3: Breakout

description: Blood Brothers pt. 5. Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Continued from Bloodstrike #3. This is it, the conclusion to one of the bloodiest super hero battles of all time. Brigade and Bloodstrike come at each other in full force and the two teams will never be the same again. Guest-starring Bloodstrike.
name: Blood Brothers, Part 5: And In The End...

description: Story by Ripley and Marat Mychaels. Art by Marat Mychaels, Richard Horie, Marlo Alquiza, and Jonathan Sibal. Battlestone has more skeletons in his closet than the mousey girl in the next cubical. Brigade's enigmatic leader's past comes back to haunt the team yet again, this time in the form of the undersea powerhouse known as Roman. What does this mysterious ruler of an undersea kingdom want with our heroes? Plus, the back-up story "Doubt" featuring Lethal by Eric Stephenson, Marat Mychaels, Vince Russell, and Jonathan Sibal.
name: Changes

description: Bridging the gap between Youngblood #0 and the first issue of last year’s Brigade mini-series, Brigade #0 chronicles the sequence of events leading up to the formation of the Brigade team, including Battlestone’s first confrontation with Youngblood and Shaft! Guest-starring Emp, of Jim Lee’s WildC.A.T.s.
name: In the Beginning...

description: Guest-starring Roman. Glory, Super Patriot, and Die Hard cameos. Story by Ripley and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Battlestone's old friend and mentor Roman has returned with dire news. And what do the brothers Coldsnap and Seahawk have to do with it? Featured in this issue is flashback to WWII when Battlestone was a younger man and a member of the super-powered team of heroes known as the Allies.
name: It's A Very Deep Sea

description: "A World Below." Guest-starring Roman. Story by Ripley and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Roman has brought his allies Brigade to the underwater kingdom of Neuport to liberate his people from the mad barbarian Warlok. Revealed here is the mystical origins of the brothers Coldsnap and Seahawk. Plus, witness a transformation in Battlestone that you'd never thought you'd see.
name: A World Below

description: "Deep Cover." Guest-starring Roman. Story by Ripley and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Norm Rapmund. Battlestone has merged with the aging sorcerer Trident in order to take down the evil despot known as Warlok. What happens next is a wizard's duel the likes of which have never been witnessed before. Includes interludes featuring Lethal and Thermal.
name: Deep Cover

description: Extreme Prejudice pt. 2. Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Marlo Alquiza. Continued from Team Youngblood #7. The ultra powerful menace known as Quantum has escaped and comes calling. He has already thumped Team Youngblood and now it's Brigades turn. The mega-crossover event continues here. Story continues in Bloodstrike #9. Include coupon #2 of 7 for Extreme Prejudice #0. Plus, a 2 page Black and White back-up story and an Extreme Studios check-list.
name: Extreme Prejudice, Part 2: Irreconcilable Differences

description: Extreme Prejudice pt. 6. Guest-starring Team Youngblood and Bloodstrike. Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Marat Mychaels and Marlo Alquiza. Continued from Team Youngblood #8. Quantum has defeated Team Youngblood, Brigade, Bloodstrike, and even the ultra powerful Supreme. Can anyone hope to stop this madman and prevent him from fulfilling his dark desires. Don't miss this penultimate chapter of Extreme Prejudice. Story concludes in Bloodstrike #10. Include coupon #6 of 7 for Extreme Prejudice #0.
name: Extreme Prejudice, Part 6: The Crossing

description: "Picking up the pieces." Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Eric Stephenson, Anthony Winn, and Marlo Alquiza. Seahawk and Boone head out for a night on the town. Coldsnap and Thermal share a moment. Lethal fights ninja in Japan. And, Crucible is attacked by...Atlas? Isn't he dead? Plus, the return of Warcry.
name: Picking up the Pieces

description: Guest-starring the WildC.A.T.s. Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Eric Stephenson, Anthony Winn, and Marlo Alquiza. What happens when you mix together the outlaw super-heroes Brigade, the WildC.A.T.s, ninja, alien monsters, Warcry, a rainstorm, and a Japanese back-drop? A whole lot of action and super-hero mayhem. Plus, we catch up with Kayo, but it doesn't look like he's doing so well.

Guest-starring the WildC.A.T.s. Story by Rob Liefeld and Eric Stephenson. Art by Eric Stephenson, Anthony Winn, and Marlo Alquiza. Brigade and the WildC.A.T.s must team-up to stop Soroyama from using the power of the orb for his own nefarious ends. But first they'll have to get passed a Daemonite monster, cybernetic ninja, and Warcry. Plus, Hacker's back but what is his agenda?

Story by Eric Stephenson. Art by Anthony Winn, Richard Horie, Marlo Alquiza, and Paul Scott. As Brigade enjoys some much needed R&R, Thermal sits down to write the story of the year, "Inside Brigade: America's Most Dangerous Vigilantes Exposed!" She places all of Battlestone's secrets on a disk and Boone is taking this disk to his employers even if it's over Thermal's dead body. Wait a minute...Boone, a traitor? What the heck is going on here? Plus, a special preview of the mini-series featuring Battlestone's early days with Chapel and Al Simmons (Spawn) by Rob Liefeld, Eric Stephenson, Marat Mychaels, and Al Vey.

Story by Eric Stephenson and Edon Asp. Art by Anthony Winn, Marlo Alquiza, Bob Wiack, and Joe Rubinstein. Boone is making off with a disk that contains all of Battlestone's secrets. Heaven help Boone if Battlestone gets his hands on him before he reaches his rendezvous with Hacker and their benefactor. Plus, what's to become of Thermal, the woman responsible for making the disk in the first place.

"Redemption and Loss." Guest-starring Roman and the Birds of Prey. Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Anthony Winn, Marlo Alquiza, Bob Wiack, and Joe Rubinstein. In the wake of last issue's betrayal, Battlestone is gone and it's left up to the remaining members of Brigade to pick up the pieces. What will they do with Thermal, and where did Boone take Battlestone? Is this the end of Brigade? Not if Roman has anything to say about it.
Extreme Sacrifice Part 4 of 8. Glory Appearance.
name: Extreme Sacrifice, Part 4 of 8

description: Extreme Sacrifice Aftermath! "The New Order Begins Here!" Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Roger Cruz and Mark Morales. Without the leadership of Battlestone, the old guard faltered and in the aftermath of the Extreme Sacrifice, only Seahawk remained to carry on the good fight. Out of the ashes of the old, a new Brigade is born. A new more powerful team consisting of Vanguard, Glory, Supreme, Troll, Tremor, Roman, and Shadowhawk unites to carry on the fight against the forces of evil.
name: Extreme Sacrifice Aftermath

description: Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Manny Clark and Mark Morales. The new team learns more about their adversary L'xander and his mysterious cult, and what one of their own members has to do with it. Meanwhile, Roman fights valiantly for the future of his undersea kingdom.

"The Drawing of the Age of Aquaria!" Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Manny Clark and Mark Morales. Can Mark (Seahawk) survive an assassination attempt on his life? Meanwhile, things go from bad to worse for the team as Troll, not in control of his actions, betrays them to the enemy.
name: The Drawing of the Age of Aquaria!

description: Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Luke Ross, Mark Morales, Danny Miki, Jonathan Sibal, and Jaime Mendoza. The All-New Brigade is free and it's time to take the fight to the enemy. Vanguard, Glory, Supreme, Troll, Tremor, Roman, and Shadowhawk cut loose in a battle for the ages, but what will happen when the amphibian super-man, Roman, against his will, is turned against his allies?

"Death of a Hero!" Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Manny Clark, Mark Morales, Keith Aken, and Bruce Patterson. As the team honors the passing of their friend and ally Shadowhawk, Roman, Vanguard, Glory, Troll, Seahawk, and Supreme are attacked by the nigh unstoppable demon Drakkus. But this creature is just the harbinger for an even more nefarious threat, the Haunt.
name: Death of a Hero!

description: Supreme Apocalypse! Part 4 of 5. Story by Marv Wolfman. Art by Manny Clark, Mark Morales, and Keith Aiken. The malevolent Darkthornn's invasion of the Earth realm continues. Can the heroes of Earth muster a strong enough defense against this other-worldly threat? And when their most powerful hero, Supreme, falls, what hope is there for the future. Story concludes in Supreme #30.

This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. This issue: "Have You Seen Me?" Part 1 (of 6) In the all-new Sam and Twitch monthly book, Eisner- and Harvey-nominated creators Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse take our intrepid detectives on a journey that will leave S&T changed forever! Twitch's past-like a boomerang-comes careening back to haunt not only him, but those he loves (and has loved)! No one is safe from the brutal vengeance ofS aww, now that would be telling! With exciting painted and pen-and-ink artwork from Scott Morse and a nail-biting script by Marc Andreyko, the six-issue arc "Have You Seen Me?" will leave your jaw on the floor!
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 1

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, featuring unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only. Twitch's life is shattered as ghosts from the past return for vengeance! And no one Twitch knows is safe --- not his friends, his partner, his children! As the horrors inflicted on Twitch get greater, will he crack under the stress? And will he turn to cold- blooded murder to stop it?
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 2

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only. Art shown is the cover "Have You Seen Me, Part 3?" Part 3 of 6-part story arc, As Twitch reels from the reappearance of someone long thought dead, another body blow strikes -- an event so tragic and life-changing that it will change the lives of Sam and Twitch forever. Det. Twitch Williams on trial for first-degree murder? And the star witness? Sam!
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 3

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. "Have You Seen Me, Part 4?" of 6-part story arc. Twitch's descent into madness continues as his reality is shattered by tragedy after tragedy. After two staggering losses, can it get any worse for the detective? The answer is YES! While his family reels at the pain that seems to never stop, an unwelcome visitor appears: an old girlfriend of Sam's! The trouble is ... she's been dead for years!
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 4

description: This is the second spin-off book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, and features unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only.  In the penultimate chapter of "Have You Seen Me?" Twitch's life careens out of control! Will the pressure cause him to turn his back on everything he has believed? How much suffering can one man take before he is damaged beyond repair? And what makes Sam turn against his best friend?
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 5

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only.  "Have You Seen Me, Part 6?" The startling conclusion to the "Have You Seen Me?" arc! The fate of Twitch's children and the verdict in Twitch's trial are revealed! Will the tragedies inflicted on Det. Williams destroy him, strengthen him or something far worse? Plots are twisted and futures determined in this, the final chapter of the Casefiles' first arc!
name: Have You Seen Me? Part 6

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only. Art shown is the cover  "Skeletons" Part 1 (of 6)-What do a powerful senator, his legendary political family, a brutal murder/suicide, an elite boys' prep school and more hidden secrets than a Southern Gothic novel have in common? Three words: Detective Sam Burke. Confused? Intrigued? Well, imagine how Sam feels. Arc #2 of the critically acclaimed new series explodes with a political thriller for fans of author Dominick Dunne, films like The Parallax View and everyone who loves the scandals that follow politicians like the plague!
name: Skeletons, Part 1

description: This is the second spinoff book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in the core Spawn title. Casefiles: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, featuring unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Scott Morse. Intended for mature audiences only. "Skeletons" Part II, Second of a new 6-part story arc. Sam and Twitch are drawn deeper into a bloody conspiracy as an old schoolmate of Sam's shows up with some startling accusations about a presidential candidate! Assassinations, double-lives and murder are just the beginning! How far will Sam and Twitch go to expose the truth? And how far will their enemies go to shut them down?
name: Skeletons, Part 2

description: This is the second spin-off book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in Spawn. Case Files: Sam and Twitch takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from Marc Andreyko and Paul Lee.  "Skeletons" Part Three. As Sam and Twitch delve deeper into the past of the Halloran family, known as America's Royalty, the detectives uncover more than they bargained for ? and place themselves in the crosshairs of a 50-year-old conspiracy! And does Sam know more than he is saying? If so, what dark event is keeping him silent?
name: Skeletons, Part 3

description: This is the second spin-off book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in SPAWN. CASE FILES: SAM & TWITCH takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, feature unique artwork and storytelling from MARK ANDREYKO and PAUL LEE.  "Skeletons" Part Four, The creepy secrets of the powerful Halloran family keep piling up...and so do the bodies of anyone who crosses this political dynasty. Will Sam and Twitch end up on the wrong side of the Senator's wrath? And when is Oliver Stone gonna show up to help unravel the decades-old political conspiracies?
name: Skeletons, Part 4

description: This is the second spin-off book featuring New York City police detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, popular characters originally introduced in SPAWN. CASE FILES: SAM & TWITCH takes the crime noir world of Sam and Twitch to a darker level, featuring unique artwork and storytelling from MARC ANDREYKO and PAUL LEE.  "Skeletons" Part Six?The shocking finale to the second story arc! Sam faces ghosts from his past and demons in the present. Will an assassin's bullet change everything or will detectives Burke and Williams prevent even more blood from being spilled?
name: Skeletons, Part 6

description: 1953, Hawaii. WWII vet Byrd is thrown off his stateside police force after an "incident" with a suspect. Having nowhere else to go, Byrd turns to his Army buddy, Mo Kalama, a detective in Hawaii. He now spends his days drinking tropical concoctions and his nights helping Mo with cases that fall just beyond the jurisdiction of the police. And in Byrd's Hawaii, the supernatural manifestations of the islands' myths and legends lie just around every corner. When Byrd is pulled away from a lazy afternoon of jazz and cocktails to track down a stolen '49 Buick Roadmaster, the case seems simple enough. Yet he's soon immersed in a dark paradise of swank tiki lounges, exotic bar girls, murdered beauties, high speed chases along the scenic Hawaiian coast, and the mysterious Night Marchers of the Pali Highway. Now Byrd and Mo must untangle this tropical web of tiki terror without becoming ensnared themselves.
name: Trunk Call

description: 1953, Hawaii. WWII vet Byrd is thrown off his stateside police force after an "incident" with a suspect. Having nowhere else to go, Byrd turns to his Army buddy, Mo Kalama, a detective in Hawaii. He now spends his days drinking tropical concoctions and his nights helping Mo with cases that fall just beyond the jurisdiction of the police. And in Byrd's Hawaii, the supernatural manifestations of the islands' myths and legends lie just around every corner. Byrd and Mo spend a stormy night tracking a zombie, walking in and out of traps set by the cunning and eccentric Bishop Masaki, and learning the chilling truth about the mysterious women they've found themselves entangled with. The story comes to a deadly conclusion as all players are reunited on the rainswept Honolulu docks. The first chapter of HAWAIIAN DICK concludes, with the course of Byrd's future being plotted in the cold waters of the Pacific Ocean.
name: We'll Meet Again

description: In this long-awaited follow-up to the critically acclaimed HAWAIIAN DICK, Private Investigator Byrd finds himself entangled in a gangland turf war for control of paradise. Hired to investigate the mysterious sabotage of a brand new luxury resort, Byrd soon finds a smorgasbord of suspects, both human and inhuman. Torn between rival factions, Byrd can't rely on help from his friend, Detective Mo Kalama, who finds himself stalked by the very men who hired Byrd. Byrd arrives at the Seaside Sands Resort in his sparkling new convertible and walks straight into trouble. He finds himself working for a notorious Stateside mob boss, while fending off the attention of another. Meanwhile, Kahami and Mo arrive undercover, but Mo finds that 300-pound Honolulu detectives are easily identified by determined killers. Ghostly women, gangland thugs falling from the sky and surf, sun and leisure are shaken together in this latest tropical noir cocktail.
name: Dropping In

description: In this long-awaited follow-up to the critically acclaimed HAWAIIAN DICK, Private Investigator Byrd finds himself entangled in a gangland turf war for control of paradise. Hired to investigate the mysterious sabotage of a brand-new luxury resort, Byrd soon finds a smorgasbord of suspects, both human and inhuman. Torn between rival factions, Byrd can't rely on help from his friend, Detective Mo Kalama, who finds himself stalked by the very men who hired Byrd. With Mo missing, Byrd attempts to unravel the mystery behind the sabotage of the Seaside Sands and Coral Reef resorts. As Kahami heads into the surrounding villages, Byrd attempts to coax information from underworld strongman Stew Mulligan by drinking him under the table. Along the way, Byrd stumbles onto the secret behind the mob's fascination with Hawaii, Kahami uncovers the legends of the bay, Mo prepares for a date with hungry sharks, and Stew comes face-to-face with his own mortality.
name: Stewed

description: In this follow-up to the critically acclaimed HAWAIIAN DICK, Private Investigator Byrd finds himself entangled in a gangland turf war for control of paradise. Hired to investigate the mysterious sabotage of a brand new luxury resort, Byrd soon finds any number of suspects, both human and inhuman. Torn between rival factions, Byrd can't rely on help from his friend, Detective Mo Kalama, who finds himself stalked by the very men who hired Byrd. Loose ends are tied together as others unravel. The FBI makes its presence known, and a hungover Byrd confronts the crime families with what information he has regarding their motivations. Meanwhile, Mo prepares for a date with man-eating sharks, and a sunbathing Kahami encounters (deceased?) mob enforcer Stew Mulligan. The meaning of 'The Last Resort' is revealed in the (literally) explosive conclusion, setting the stage for ghostly retribution and all-out gang warfare in the concluding chapter.
name: Trouble Brews

description: In this follow-up to the critically acclaimed HAWAIIAN DICK: BYRD IN PARADISE, Private Investigator Byrd finds himself entangled in a gangland turf war for control of paradise. Hired to investigate the mysterious sabotage of a brand new luxury resort, Byrd soon finds any number of suspects, both human and inhuman. Torn between rival factions, Byrd can't rely on help from his friend, Detective Mo Kalama, who finds himself stalked by the very men who hired Byrd.Things go from bad to really, really bad in this final chapter of the second Hawaiian Dick series. It's absolute mayhem as rival gangs tear through the Last Resort in a revenge match for the ages. Complicating matters are the angry spirits of Hawaiian dead, risen from their graves and evidently impervious to gangland bullets. Byrd, Mo and Kahami focus on one goal: escaping alive before the entire bay explodes in a bullet-fueled spectacle of supernatural fury.
name: Moonlight Massacre

description: Everyday girl Liz Donnelly is a stranger in a strange land -- an everyday person who married into a family of celebrity super-heroes! Behind the glamour and wonder lie dark secrets, ruthless ambition, and twisted desires. A brutal crime rocks the Noble family, and their old friend Krennick is the prime suspect. Meanwhile, Rusty's new girlfriend, Cosmic Rae, recruits him for a secret government mission, and Doc receives news that a man obsessed with Gaia is about to be released from prison.

Everyday girl Liz Donnelly is a stranger in a strange land -- an everyday person who married into a family of celebrity super-heroes! Behind the glamour and wonder lie dark secrets, ruthless ambition, and twisted desires.  Doc's plan to help Krennick clear his name results in Krennick having to make a terrible choice. Meanwhile, tempers flare amongst Rusty's teammates, as the diverse heroes embark on a perilous journey; and Gaia unwittingly attracts the attention of Detective O'Mega.

Everyday girl Liz Donnelly is a stranger in a strange land -- an everyday person who married into a family of celebrity super-heroes! Behind the glamour and wonder lie dark secrets, ruthless ambition, and twisted desires.  A surprising source approaches Race and Liz with information that casts Krennick in a bad light; a surprising figure aids Detective O'Mega in his investigation of Krennick; and Rusty and his teammates face overwhelming odds on their secret mission.

As friends and foes close in on Krennick, he uncovers a secret from his past that could dramatically affect his future. Meanwhile, on a distant planet, Frost and Cosmic Rae have been separated from Rusty and the others - which doesn't please Rusty one bit. And back on Earth, Gaia starts to wonder if the "new" Doc is too good to be true.

Invincible drops by to help Doc out of a jam. But how will Doc feel about being shown up by some young punk? Meanwhile, chaos explodes beneath the surface of the Earth, as numerous factions converge on the fugitive Krennick, and he's forced to chose between his demonic heritage and his adopted humanity.

1: At First Sight

Doc Noble meets the beautiful Gaia, who eventually becomes his wife.

2: Temper, Temper

Rusty Noble meets Lightning Rod, a superhero based out of Brooklyn.

3: Punch-Line

Doc Noble reflects on a mission he shared with his son, Race Noble.

4: A Perfect Stranger

Zephyr Noble receives assistance from a friendly barrister.

5: First Frost

Frost confronts his mother in front of his half-siblings

6: The Widow

Liz Donnelly-Noble goes on her first date after the death of her husband, Race Noble.

7: Father & Fiend

Race Noble, as a young child, followed Doc Noble when he entered Draconis' realm to defeat him.

8: S.T.A.T.

Dr. Prize is a relative of the Noble Family, but has decided to become a doctor instead of a superhero.

9: Tattle

A tabloid journalist trails the Noble family.

1: Bash

The Nobles have a big gala at their mansion

2: Family Matters

Zephyr runs from home and finds her half-brother, Frost.

3: Sweeps Week!

The cast and crew of a television show that is based on the Nobles deals with their next season's script.

4: Live And Let Diode

Icarus wonders why he continues to have urges of killing the children of Doc Noble.

5: Rite Of Passage

Krennick is tested by his father, Draconis.

6: Educating Doc

7: Pushing The Right Buttons

Zephyr Noble is forced to do something by a group of criminals.

8: How The Servants Reclaimed Their Demonhood

Some demon servants of Gaia revert to their demonic nature.

What if Europe never crawled out of the dark ages? What if magic and the occult sciences were real? Welcome to Rex Mundi. Jazz is all the rage in the smoky nightclubs of Paris, but kings still rule Europe, and the Holy Inquisition maintains order with an iron fist. Far from prying eyes, sorcerers practice magical arts rumored to have been founded in Biblical times. Amidst this setting, thunderheads of a cataclysmic war are gathering...
name: The Secret Beneath the Church

description: Master Physician Julien Saunière makes a horrific discovery in the slums of Paris while investigating the theft of a medieval manuscript from his longtime friend, Catholic priest Gérard Marin. Sorcery and organized crime are implicated in the theft, and Julien seeks the advice of an old friend. Meanwhile, Father Marin has an unexpected visitor at his home...
name: Unexpected Visitors

description: THE PUZZLE IN THE PAINTING ? Master Physician Julien Sauniére confronts the Holy Inquisition for the first time, in front of the smoking ruins of Father Marin's home. Julien returns to his practice and discovers a letter written by the father the day before; a letter pointing to a 300-year-old clue to the disappearance of the mysterious scroll. And for the first time in many years, he meets an old friend and an old lover.
name: An Old Flame

description: The Archbishop and the Pimp The Holy Inquisition visits Dr. Saunière in his apartment, and he is dragged before the Archbishop for a brutal lesson on power in Paris. In other corridors of power Genevieve, Julien's ex-lover, reveals the reason for her renewed interest in Julien. Later, Julien confronts a dangerous thug about the missing scroll, and another layer of the mystery is revealed. And by issue's end, the body count rises by one...
name: The Archbishop and the Pimp

description: Shadows Beneath the City Dr. Julien Saunière penetrates the highest ranks of the Paris underworld on his quest to find the stolen medieval scroll that cost the life of his best friend Father Gérard Marin. The hunt for the scroll literally takes Julien to the lowest depths of the city. Meanwhile, Genevieve uncovers a clue to the meaning of the mysterious Latin phrase "Et in Arcadia Ego" in the palace of the Duke of Lorraine...
name: Shadows Beneath the City

description: Genevieve and Julien revisit the secret library beneath the Church of the Magdalene, which is being guarded by the Inquisition. There, they learn a shocking secret about an ancient order of knights supposedly exterminated many hundreds of years earlier, a secret that connects to the mystery of the stolen scroll. And Genevieve's relationship with the Duke of Lorraine grows ever more intimate...
name: The Knights of the Temple

description: "Father of Wisdom." Genevieve must save Julien's medical practice from being shut down by the Guild of Physicians. Can she do it? Later, Julien visits Rabbi Maiselles and discovers a clue to the true identity of the mysterious entity known as "Baphomet." No, it's not the devil... Julien also trys to question the wealthy Hugo deMedici, who is somehow connected to the stolen scroll and Marin's murder. But deMedici isn't accepting visitors...
name: The Knights of the Temple

description: Julien comes tantalizingly close to the stolen scroll, and terrifyingly close to the Inquisition. He discovers the purpose of the temple in the sewers in a return visit underground. Meanwhile, Genevieve's relationship with the Duke of Lorraine grows ever more intimate. But the more evidence Julien collects, the more he suspects Lorraine's involvement in the theft of the scroll.Will Julien find the scroll, or will he find himself in the dungeons of the Inquisition?
name: The Scroll and the Key

description: On the trail of a stolen scroll connected to a thousand year-old secret society, master physicians Julien Saunière and Genevieve Tournon head to France's national library. There they uncover a vital clue linking neo-classicalist painter Nicholas Poussin to the mysterious stolen scroll. Genevieve returns to the Duke of Lorraine's "cottage" and finds smoke coming from a chimney outside. But Lorraine's valet insists no fireplace is lit...And later that night, Julien receives a midnight visitor...
name: The Man in the Iron Mask

character_credits.name: The Man In The Iron Mask

first_appearance_characters.name: The Man In The Iron Mask

description: Julien uncovers the true meaning of "ET IN ARCADIA EGO" in a strange midnight rendezvous. Five hundred years of conspiracy unfold as he learns about the secret history of the Holy Grail. Julien and Rabbi Maiselles also finally crack mysterious coded scrolls connected to the mystery, but they are rudely interrupted...
name: The River Alpheus

description: "THE TREASURE OF THE TEMPLE" Julien, a prisoner of the Inquisition, finds an unexpected ally, and at long last recovers the stolen medieval scroll. What secrets does it contain? REX MUNDI: THE TREASURE OF THE TEMPLE completes the second story arc of the REX MUNDI saga.
name: The Treasure of the Temple

description: "THE SWAN KNIGHT"?The Duke of Lorraine consolidates his expanding power in a meeting with a famous British statesman. Julien discovers a tenuous link between a group of medieval heretics and the anathematized Knights Templar. Genevive witnesses a violent confrontation between Lorraine and his daughter. Finally, a vital clue to the meaning of the stolen scrolls is revealed...
name: The Swan Knight

description: "THE LOST KINGS" Julien discovers a geometrical riddle hidden in plain sight on the streets of Paris. The key to the puzzle leads him into the deepest danger he has ever known. Meanwhile, a minor aristocrat frustrates the Duke of Lorraine's sinister plans. Lorraine will have to find a way around? or through? the problem.
name: The Lost Kings

description: After a rescue mission in Peru, Stryker and Strykeforce set out to find the son of a USC professor. Little do they realize that he's far from an ordinary young man and the United States government is also extremely interested in him.

Overview

The truth about little Tommy Jenkins has been revealed—and it just might kill the Strykeforce! As the team struggles to stay alive in light of this shocking revelation, Tommy's final fate rests in the hands of Morgan Stryker—which doesn't exactly please all the team members.

Introducing the next generation of super-heroes...meet Youngblood. This explosive first issue features two teams and two exciting adventures. First Shaft, Die Hard, Bedrock, Vogue, and Chapel must confront the nefarious Four. Then, Sentinel leads Riptide, Brahma, Photon, Psi-Fire, and Cougar into a Middle-Eastern country to put an end to an evil dictator's rule. Brought to you by the co-creator of Cable from the New Mutants and X-Force.

The rebel faction known as the Berserkers make a daring escape from the Death Squad, but who is the ominous Darkthorn. Meanwhile, Youngblood team members Sentinel, Brahma, Riptide, Cougar, and Combat awaken a super-soldier who has been in cryogenic sleep since the days of WWII. When John Prophet awakens disorientated and in a world he does not recognize, he mistakes Youngblood for his mortal enemies the Disciples and attacks. Plus, a 6 page back-up story introducing a new hero who stalks the criminal element at night, Shadow Hawk.
name: Prelude

description: Sentinel's team lies defeated and unconscious before the invading hordes of the android Disciples. The only thing standing in their way is John Prophet, a genetically engineered super-soldier. Meanwhile, the criminals known as the Four attempt to rescue their imprisoned teammate from the holding cells of Youngblood HQ. Just one problem, they'll have to get through Shaft and Chapel first. Plus, the 6 page back-up story "Enter: Supreme/Enter: Heavy Mettle," which serves as a prelude for Supreme #1

Sentinel and his team are out of the fight and Prophet can barely stand. Yet, the Disciples keep pouring through the portal. Luckily, back-up has arrived. Die Hard and Badrock charge headlong through the portal and come face-to-face with the ominous Darkthorn. As Shaft and his team, the Berserkers, Sentinel, and Prophet regroup for a final assault, Die Hard is tossed at their feet defeated. Then, Darkthorn emerges from the portal with a new ally...a mind-controlled Badrock. Things just got worse. Continues in Brigade #4.
name: In Final Battle

description: This is a flip-issue, sharing its pages with "Brigade" #4 (Vol. 1, 1993)

Die Hard heads the team of Combat, Vogue, and Dutch to find and shut down the criminal organization Cybernet permanently. Their story continues in Team Youngblood #10. Meanwhile, Badrock is attacked on the set of a popular talk show by an angry fan. Plus, Shaft is introduced to the new Youngblood members, Knight Sabre, Troll, and the latest creation from the Die Hard program.

As Shaft deals with an eating disorder, Troll is approached and warned by the head of the department to behave himself, and Knight Sabre gets in some extensive training. Meanwhile, continued from Spawn #23, Badrock enjoys the Ski slopes of Vail. However, his vacation is cut short when the cybernetic killing machine known as Overtkill shows up damaged and ready to make the Boy of Stone feel as bad as he does. Story continues in Team Youngblood #11. Plus, an Epilogue featuring the return of Chapel.

Shaft assembles a team of Youngblood members to take out the cabal of villains who almost killed Die Hard, Vogue, Combat, and Dutch in Team Youngblood #10. Meanwhile. Chapel looks up his old pal Al Simmons and intends to settle the score with the hell Spawn. Continued in Youngblood #10.

Badrock has been optioned. Hollywood wants to make a TV show featuring the Boy of Stone. Badrock invites everybody to the premier and I do mean everybody. Featuring everyone in the Image Universe. As the show proceeds it becomes quite apparent that Badrock should have read the script first. Hilarity ensues in this self-contained issue.

Chapel attacks Spawn and informs him that he no longer is the man he knows. During this time, Knightsabre, Task, Badrock and Psilence are confronted to Maddock, Blackrock and Warwolf, as well as the troops of Maddock. Task cut Blackrock's head but it's not enough to kill him, then Psilence uses her powers to finish him. After a quick fight, they win the battle.

Chapel wants to die to earn the same powers that Spawn has. Spawn tries to stop him but Chapel committed suicide before he can move.

Psilence, thanks to her powers, learns about this tragedy and prevents her teammates that this is just a beginning.

This is a prelude to the Extreme Sacrifice saga.
name: The Death of Chapel

description: A-1 Comics is an anthology of collected comic strips.
name: Kerry Drake
Who Call Her Rare Bit Fiends
...And the Death of Rare Bit Fiends

description:
Story: "The Man in the Corporate Booth"

Note: this story takes place before the events of the preview story seen in Miracleman #8 and The New DNAgents #9
name: The Man in the Corporate Booth
When a Stranger Comes to Call
Stop the Station, I Want to Get Off!
